name: Team Lads tumblr dashboard theme
description: A theme based on Team Lads from Achievement Hunter :)
additional_info:
EDIT (7/11/14): Something changed on the site so I had to change the background setting. Also removed the blue gradient from some more pages. Fixed some of the ugly white backgrounds on some pages.

EDIT (11/17/13): Condensed some redundant code and made it so the theme applies to the /settings, /help, and /docs pages.

EDIT (11/7/13): Fixed some aesthetic things like the color of the footer links and that ugly blue gradient on the Recommended Blogs.

EDIT (10/9/13): Noticed a bug where the background was loading on some tumblr widgets on other sites and looked weird. I changed the condition of showing the background from 'body' to '.logged-in' so hopefully this fixed it.

EDIT (9/25/13): I noticed that it only formatted the first page of the Following section, so I fixed that. I also edited the Lookup page to be formatted like the Following and Spotlight sections.

It's modified from another theme called Achievement Hunter theme, which can be found here: http://userstyles.org/styles/89618/achievement-hunter-theme

I've changed a lot of the code and added some stuff, so I figured I'd make this theme available for other people to use if they want.

The gifs on the background are by life-writer from tumblr, who can be found here: http://life-writer.tumblr.com/

Please tell me about any bugs you run across!
